definitions: (of fat) melted in order to separate out the impurities

examples.text: strain the rendered fat through a sieve

shortDefinitions: (of fat) melted in order to separate out impurities

definitions: (of the carcass of an animal) processed in order to extract proteins, fats, and other usable parts

examples.text: the rendered down remains of sheep

shortDefinitions: (of carcass of animal) processed to extract proteins, fats, etc.

definitions: (of stone or brick) covered with a coat of plaster
shortDefinitions: (of stone or brick) covered with plaster
